statements: SELECT * FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE species = 'lion';
SELECT species, location FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT animal_id, species, timestamp FROM wildlife_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE location = POINT(50, 75);
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS count FROM wildlife_tracking GROUP BY species;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE species = 'Tiger';
SELECT species, location FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT animal_id, species, location FROM wildlife_tracking WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND location ->> 'latitude' > '40';
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM wildlife_tracking GROUP BY species ORDER BY total_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT species FROM wildlife_tracking ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulations;
SELECT Species, Latitude, Longitude FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE ID = 2;
SELECT * FROM MovementPatterns WHERE MovementType = 'Migration';
SELECT PopulationID, MovementType FROM MovementPatterns ORDER BY Speed DESC;
SELECT Species, Latitude, Longitude, Timestamp FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE Species = 'Tiger';
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE Latitude > 0 AND Longitude < 0
SELECT Species, Timestamp FROM WildlifePopulations ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT Species, PopulationID, MovementType FROM WildlifePopulations JOIN MovementPatterns ON WildlifePopulations.ID = MovementPatterns.PopulationID
SELECT Species, Speed, Direction FROM WildlifePopulations JOIN MovementPatterns ON WildlifePopulations.ID = MovementPatterns.PopulationID WHERE Speed > 10
SELECT Species, Latitude, Longitude FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE Timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Latitude ASC, Longitude DESC
SELECT * FROM GPS_Tracking_Data WHERE animal_id = 1;
SELECT location, population_name FROM Wildlife_Populations ORDER BY population_name DESC;
SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM GPS_Tracking_Data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT movement_type, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM Movement_Patterns WHERE animal_id = 3 ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC;
SELECT population_name, location FROM Wildlife_Populations WHERE population_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM GPS_Tracking_Data ORDER BY timestamp ASC, animal_id DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM GPS_Tracking_Data WHERE animal_id = 12345;
SELECT population_id, population_name, location FROM Wildlife_Populations WHERE location LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT MAX(latitude) AS max_latitude, MIN(longitude) AS min_longitude FROM GPS_Tracking_Data;
SELECT animal_id, COUNT(id) AS movements_count FROM Movement_Patterns GROUP BY animal_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM GPS_Tracking_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT animal_id, latitude, longitude FROM GPS_Tracking_Data WHERE animal_id = 5;
SELECT habitat_name, terrain_type FROM Habitat_Details WHERE climate = 'Tropical';
SELECT * FROM Animal_Details WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT movement_type, speed, direction FROM Movement_Patterns ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM GPS_Tracking_Data WHERE animal_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, latitude, longitude FROM GPS_Tracking_Data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT td.species_name, hd.habitat_name FROM Animal_Details td JOIN Habitat_Details hd ON td.habitat = hd.habitat_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM GPS_Tracking_Data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT td.species_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Animal_Details td JOIN GPS_Tracking_Data gd ON td.animal_id = gd.animal_id GROUP BY td.species_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, species_id FROM species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tracking_devices WHERE device_type='GPS';
SELECT device_id, device_type, device_name FROM tracking_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT species_id, COUNT(*) AS total_population FROM animal_population GROUP BY species_id;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name FROM species WHERE species_id = 2;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM tracking_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM tracking_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT population_id, species_name, location FROM animal_population INNER JOIN species ON animal_population.species_id = species.species_id ORDER BY population_size DESC;
